thread.title: Someone Set Up a ‘Refugees Welcome’ Banner at the Statue of Liberty | Mediaite
thread.title_full: Someone Set Up a ‘Refugees Welcome’ Banner at the Statue of Liberty | Mediaite

author: Josh Feldman
title: Someone Set Up a ‘Refugees Welcome’ Banner at the Statue of Liberty | Mediaite
text:
Someone Set Up a ‘Refugees Welcome’ Banner at the Statue of Liberty by Josh Feldman | 6:01 pm, February 21st, 2017 
Some person or persons set up a banner at the Statue of Liberty today that read “Refugees Welcome”: Activists unfurl large ‘REFUGEES WELCOME’ banner over the base of the Statue of Liberty. https://t.co/BdhKTlrkps pic.twitter.com/oP9FqBD4ov 
— NBC Nightly News (@NBCNightlyNews) February 21, 2017 Someone put a “Refugees Welcome” banner atop the Statue of Liberty pedestal this afternoon (photo obtained by NBC News) pic.twitter.com/pz7qpAjyYO 
— Bradd Jaffy (@BraddJaffy) February 21, 2017 "Refugees Welcome" banner unfurled on pedestal of Statue of Liberty; United States Park Police working to identify suspects. pic.twitter.com/rweCTGK5Ws 
— ABC News Politics (@ABCPolitics) February 21, 2017 
According to WABC , the large banner was noticed at around 1 pm and authorities took it down. 
The U.S. Park Police is currently investigating the matter. 
The Department of Homeland Security today released new guidelines for how enforcement of President Trump ‘s executive orders will go. 
A group called Alt Lady Liberty has taken credit with this statement to NBC News: “Refugees Welcome” on Statue of Liberty 
Statement from people claiming credit: “we needed to say something about the America we believe in” pic.twitter.com/Rs1JJrtl5s 
— Bradd Jaffy (@BraddJaffy) February 21, 2017 
[ featured image via NBC News ] 
——
